doo nothinge euen certaine forefather olde time tolde paule corinth apostle others afterwarde like authoritie tolde basile hilarie bishoppes hardinge false apostle arian heretiques tolde booteth trie title vvee wil onely saie paule corinth grace god vvee vvee wee truste wee haue grace vaine specially aboue al thinges throughout al three bookes yee saie sir defender vnlearned beste skil fewe figure rhetorique hath neither greeke logique philosophie diuinitie hath readde kinde doctours newe olde owne others al furniture booke broughte hande somme greeke reader somme scholemaisters hard confuta et commonly place somme ciuilians somme canonistes somme summistes somme glosers somme others hath nothinge el patched notebookes huddled togeather snappes peeces parte hereof rather whole al togeather without exception doo pleasure would easily haue graunted hardinge vpon smal suite fauoure lesse adoo take mee learninge yee liste distreine pounde pleasure wil neuer trouble repleuin yee vtter al indifferente iudgemente certaine knowledge yet impertinente wee pleaded faithe learninge otherwise yee speake heate minde abundance cholere therevpon thus proclaime vnto world great folie truely yee neuer sawe sir defender bookes neuer sette foote within studie wise iudge wil seldome pronounce knowe shal please trial hereof sende frende maie happily see sir defender hath al summistes canonistes greekereaders scholemaisters owne notwithstanding maie becomme v bothe saie heathen wiseman sommetime saidesocrates onely thinge vvee knovve vvee knovve nothinge goddes truthe dependeth knowledge tongue shal cease knowledge shal faile glorie god shal stande euer parte wil saie augustine quaere doctiores sed caue praesumptores seeke others learninge bevvare praesume learning praise falle respecte bestowe freely vpon greekereaders scholemaisters iudgemente haue beste deserued shalbe sufficiente mee haue saide truthe whiche though appeare neuer simple hable remoue mountaine learninge happy brother louaine speedily growen learned vpon suddaine greate studie trowe rather destinee soone sauoured soile countrie lookte onely vpon twoo poore title lavve extra li de maledicis de clerico promoto per saltum suddainely transfourmed nowe goe doctours learninge hardinge wee neuer reproued greately feare wee haue cause god geeue grace yee maie wholy turne glorie leste daie lorde laide againste ouer wel learned bendeth learninge againste god wee vtterly voide al manner learninge paintinge saie bookes margines name authority many doctours maie frendes thinke standing longe defence priuate masse yet hable allege one doctoure greeke latine one seemeth greate marueile yee shoulde haue sutche abundance doctours shewe fewe specially standeth mutche vpon open stoare consider beseeche late reioinder wherein thought nothinge parte leafte vntouched seuen twentie article conteined replie yee haue taken vpon onely answeare one yet one yee haue scarcely touched tenthe parte pourpose haue benne therein euidente example good authority substantially haue proued priuate masse consider order plainenesse dealinge yee bestowe welneare thirde parte booke aboute sacrifice though sacrifice without priuate masse al reste yee consume idle discourse needelesse talkes consecration intention prieste minglinge vvater vvith vvine name masse transubstantiation real presence churche feastes whiche olde time called agapae singulare communion communion faithe vnion christe sendinge abroade sacramente priestes vviues vovves bigamie good vvoorkes onely faithe publique praier tongue vnknowen ceremony fourmes accidentes epistle decretal clemens cletus anacletus abdias leontius c hereof yee haue tolde v sutche thinges perhaps wee knewe harde knowen perteined ful litle pourpose yee rather haue proued within firste sixe hundred yeeres christe somme one holy learned catholique father ministred holy communion openly churche receiued sacramente alone diuidinge vvhole multitude people sittinge standinge lookinge mater laie bitweene v hereunto yee haue laide force yee haue proued proufe sutche thinges needed proufe yee haue brought foorthe greate shewes learninge touchinge priuate masse whiche onely yee taken hande proue yee haue hitherto proued nothinge reader hardinge neuer neither simple partial muste needes haue eie vnto issue remember yee hande emongest many learned woordes finde one woorde sought maie thinke hath loste laboure somme folie fardle maie saie within selfe quo nunc se proripit iste vvhat shal make vagary meaneth man shoote faire biside marke muste needes perceiue silence notwithstandinge many faire liberal promisses yet thinge sought cannot founde naie selfe excuse hereof expresse woordes haue tolde v plainely hard reioind fol et fol mighte none receiued sacramente vvith prieste againe vvhether prieste alvvaies companie hard reioinder preface reader preface ij hardinge reioinder fol receiue vvith sommetimes receiued alone circumstance facte proufe vvhereof manifeste testimony cannot vvith reason demaunded againe contentious put v proufe circumstance againe forceth vvhether vvee bringe foorthe testimony sixe hundred yeeres againe vvhether shevve masse vvas saide vvithout companie presente receiue vvith prieste saide vvhat skilleth againe must telle seeke priuate masse reioinder vvhiche finde scoffinge pretendeth desirous seeke vvhiche acknovvledge againe forceth greately vvhether maie proued vvhiche mutche yee tolde v plainer wise space sixe hundred yeeres christe yee heare tidinges doctoure councel priuate masse vvhiche thinge thus parte confessed pourpose sufficiente touchinge authoritie amphilochius long sithence yee thought force benne inuincible therefore yee stoode vp alofte hardinge answeare fol braied alowde novve ievvel consacramentaries doo stagger doubte cause benne somme greate woorthy authoure yee alleged seuen time special reuerence one bookeroioinder fol b yet nowe laste yee contente shame turne ouer let goe perhaps yee thought weake threede sufficient leade people folkes vse sommetimes please child yee might quenche thirste emptie cuppe thus mutche hitherto touchinge somme partes reioinder concerninge former booke whiche yee haue intitled confutation neede saie nothinge iudgemente wise saithe sufficiently selfe meante hardinge therein make large discourse wil saie defence woorde frendes maie beare leaste fauoure open stevves calle hard confu fol b malum necessarium saie although il thinge yet sutche thinge good common weale maie without vvhat meante purpose shewe v name authoritie augustine thus vpbraide v endeconfu fol good soothe maisters ye yonge cotrolle cittie rome doinges vvhat needed bestowe fine eloquence fowle cause hard confu fol vice growen colde louaine muste enflamed authorized open vvritinge vvhat meante allege prophete dauid euangeliste mathevve confut deinceps paule apostle proufe pardonnes vvil yee telle v dauid matthevve paule pardoner yee dare telle v must wee beleeue yee manifestly mocke v open folie howe maie wee truste higher mysteries2 corin paule saithe though outwarde man corrupted yet inwarde man renewed daie daie yee telle v greate soothe hard confut fol luke hard confut fol b woordes vndoubtedly serue proue purgatorie christe saithe vnto peter haue praied thee c therefore yee saie christe novve requireth v obediente peter paule pope sitteth theire chaire christe saithe hard confu fol sonne man came destroie saue ergo saie breade vvine sacramente lose parte former vertues remaine fourmes accidentes euen vvere sonne god come downe heauen saue accidentes thus yee nippe sense meaninge holy scripture feede v onely emptie woordes yee woulde pike awaie corne geeue v chaffe conueigh awaie iewels throwe v bagge hardinge wilful let owne conscience leade vvas meaninge paule comminge christe worlde sense holy ghoste wil saie olde doctour anciente father summiste canoniste childe heretique euer either vndiscretely vnreuerently vsed
